Package com.mhealthatlas.enterprisemanagement.services

Class KeycloakApiService

java.lang.Object
com.mhealthatlas.enterprisemanagement.services.KeycloakApiService
@Service
@DependsOn("TlsConfiguration")
public class KeycloakApiService
extends java.lang.Object
Contains the methods which interacts with keycloak.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    KeycloakApiService()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean createGroup​(EnterpriseDto groupDto)
    Creates a HTTP POST request and add a new group to keycloak
    java.util.Optional<java.util.UUID> createUser​(UserDto userDto)
    Creates a HTTP POST request and insert a new user into keycloak
    boolean createUserRole​(java.util.UUID userId, UserDto userDto)
    Creates a HTTP POST request and insert a new user role in keycloak.
    boolean deleteGroup​(java.util.UUID groupId)
    Creates a HTTP DELETE request and remove an existing group from keycloak
    boolean deleteUser​(java.util.UUID userId)
    Creates a HTTP DELETE request and deletes an existing user in keycloak.
    private java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getAccessToken()
    Creates a HTTP POST request and receives an access token
    java.util.Optional<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> getGroup​(java.lang.String groupId)
    Creates a HTTP GET request and gets the group information from keycloak.
    java.util.Optional<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> getGroupsByName​(java.lang.String name)
    Creates a HTTP GET request and gets the group information from keycloak.
    java.util.Optional<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> getRoleByName​(java.lang.String roleName)
    Creates a HTTP GET request and gets the role information from keycloak.
    java.util.Optional<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> getUser​(java.lang.String userId)
    Creates a HTTP GET request and gets the user data for the given user id from keycloak.
    java.util.Optional<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> getUserGroups​(java.lang.String userId)
    Creates a HTTP GET request and gets the groups assigned to an user from keycloak.
    void init()
    instantiate the http client builder and set the default address to the keycloak service url
    boolean updateUser​(UserUpdateDto userDto)
    Creates a HTTP PUT request and updates an existing user in keycloak

  • Method Details

    • init

      @PostConstruct public void init()
      instantiate the http client builder and set the default address to the keycloak service url

    • getUser

      public java.util.Optional<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> getUser​(java.lang.String userId)
      Creates a HTTP GET request and gets the user data for the given user id from keycloak.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id
      Returns:
      the returned user object from keycloak, if the request was successful;
      an empty Optional otherwise;

    • getUserGroups

      public java.util.Optional<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> getUserGroups​(java.lang.String userId)
      Creates a HTTP GET request and gets the groups assigned to an user from keycloak.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id
      Returns:
      the returned user groups object from keycloak, if the request was successful;
      an empty Optional otherwise;

    • getGroup

      public java.util.Optional<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> getGroup​(java.lang.String groupId)
      Creates a HTTP GET request and gets the group information from keycloak.
      Parameters:
      groupId - the group id
      Returns:
      the returned group object from keycloak, if the request was successful;
      an empty Optional otherwise;

    • getGroupsByName

      public java.util.Optional<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> getGroupsByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a HTTP GET request and gets the group information from keycloak.
      Parameters:
      name - the group name
      Returns:
      the returned group object from keycloak, if the request was successful;
      an empty Optional otherwise;

    • getRoleByName

      public java.util.Optional<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> getRoleByName​(java.lang.String roleName)
      Creates a HTTP GET request and gets the role information from keycloak.
      Parameters:
      roleName - the role name
      Returns:
      the returned role object from keycloak, if the request was successful;
      an empty Optional otherwise;

    • createGroup

      public boolean createGroup​(EnterpriseDto groupDto)
      Creates a HTTP POST request and add a new group to keycloak
      Parameters:
      groupDto - the group data
      Returns:
      True, if the request was successful;
      False otherwise;

    • deleteGroup

      public boolean deleteGroup​(java.util.UUID groupId)
      Creates a HTTP DELETE request and remove an existing group from keycloak
      Parameters:
      groupId - the group id
      Returns:
      True, if the request was successful;
      False otherwise;

    • createUser

      public java.util.Optional<java.util.UUID> createUser​(UserDto userDto)
      Creates a HTTP POST request and insert a new user into keycloak
      Parameters:
      userDto - the user data
      Returns:
      the user id, if the request was successful;
      an empty Optional otherwise;

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser​(UserUpdateDto userDto)
      Creates a HTTP PUT request and updates an existing user in keycloak
      Parameters:
      userDto - the new user data
      Returns:
      True, if the request was successful;
      False otherwise;

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Creates a HTTP DELETE request and deletes an existing user in keycloak.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id
      Returns:
      True, if the request was successful;
      False otherwise;

    • createUserRole

      public boolean createUserRole​(java.util.UUID userId, UserDto userDto)
      Creates a HTTP POST request and insert a new user role in keycloak.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id
      userDto - the user data
      Returns:
      True, if the request was successful;
      False otherwise;

    • getAccessToken

      private java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getAccessToken()
      Creates a HTTP POST request and receives an access token
      Returns:
      the received access token, if the request was successful;
      an empty Optional otherwise;
